text: Is there a video explaining how automatic differentiation works. I understand that it's practically an exact derivative, but I just cant seem to wrap my head around it

text: I think the problem with docs on AD is that the mathematicians stuff is unreadable to cs people and the cs stuff is unreadable to math people

elements.text: I think the problem with docs on AD is that the mathematicians stuff is unreadable to cs people and the cs stuff is unreadable to math people

text: So my advice would be to carefully select your sources according to the viewpoint you're most familiar with

elements.text: So my advice would be to carefully select your sources according to the viewpoint you're most familiar with

text: Also forward is trivial and reverse is black magic

elements.text: Also forward is trivial and reverse is black magic
